transcript.text: Hey Patrick! Welcome to the team. How's your first week going?

transcript.text: It's been a lot to take in, but everyone's been helpful. Trying to understand all the moving pieces.

transcript.text: I've seen Sam in the standups. What's my role in the migration?

transcript.text: We want you to focus on the Checkout Service. Marcus Williams has been leading that, but he could use a second senior engineer. The goal is to have the new architecture ready by Q2.

transcript.text: Got it. I noticed there's an Auth Token Refresh Bug that keeps coming up. Is that related?

transcript.text: Yes, it's a blocker. The auth flow between services is fragile. We need someone with your experience to help untangle it. Marcus can bring you up to speed.

transcript.text: Makes sense. What about Priya and Riley?

transcript.text: Priya Sharma is our frontend expert—she owns the Metrics Dashboard. Riley O'Brien handles DevOps and CI/CD. You'll want to sync with Riley on deployment stuff for Checkout.

transcript.text: This is really helpful. Any advice for ramping up?
